Text: Thanks! any idea the bit rate?

For clarity, this is the Original Broadway Cast version which was released on vinyl before the movie was made, with Ian Gillan of Deep Purple singing the part of Jesus; IMHO the best version, but I guess the first one you heard is always the best. :-)

Format                           : MPEG Audio
Format version                   : Version 1
Format profile                   : Layer 3
Mode                             : Joint stereo
Duration                         : 5mn 33s
Bit rate mode                    : Constant
Bit rate                         : 320 Kbps
Channel(s)                       : 2 channels
Sampling rate                    : 44.1 KHz
